articles.title: Tiny, mineral grains could explain a fundamental tectonic force - Tech Explorist
articles.description: A new study suggests that tiny, mineral grains — squeezed and mixed over millions of years — set in motion the chain of events that plunge massive tectonic plates deep into the Earth’s interior.
